name: WWIII (ko3ak)
description:
A game created to raise money for Ukraine.

My country has been invaded! You have to act as an artilleryman. You must not allow even one of the enemies to break through!

It is planned to make a bunch of other tasks with a variety of gameplay. Unless of course this game will be interesting to the public.

You can also help with both music and art for the game. It will also be interesting to hear your ideas.

Controls:

A, B, C - Attack

D-Pad - move

Key Features of wwIII (World War III):

6 stages, each with a separate mission.

PAL and NTSC compatible.

PLEASE NOTE:

SALES TAX or VAT will be added to your order at checkout.

All profits from this game will go to Ukraine.
